entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches near the river this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
